creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: R scene: pale, misty gray mountain peaks in middle ground; tree growing at lower center on small cliff; faint trees in LRQ; inscription top half
inscription: {sabishisa wa/ sono iro to shi mo/ nakarikeri/ maki tatsu yama no/ aki no yugure} (Loneliness/ has no color/ on this cedar covered/ mountain/ in the autumn dusk)
medium: Ink and light color on silk
object_name: Hanging scroll, one of a triptych (right)
title: Three Scenes of Autumn Evening
